basics.name: Eduardo Carrera
basics.headline: Full Stack Developer | Project Manager | APIs and Agile Methodologies Specialist

summary.name: SUMMARY
summary.content:
Professional in Information Technology specialized in cross-platform software development, with experience in agile project management, backend/frontend, API integration, AI and system maintenance.

Leadership in automation, CRM and dashboard initiatives applying Scrum, optimizing processes and fostering collaborative environments.

I stand out for my focus on technological optimization, continuous learning and measurable results, seeking to contribute in teams that integrate Python, JavaScript, Node.js, AI and SQL databases.

items.position: Full Stack Developer | AI and Custom Dashboards
items.summary:
• Develop control panels and custom CRMs using JavaScript, SQL and Python to improve operational reporting
  • Implement AI models to optimize delivery times and software quality
  • Document weekly deliveries and maintain development traceability under Scrum
  • Integrate RESTful API with PostgreSQL and Node.js to extend CRM functionality
  • Design automated unit tests with Postman to validate integrations
  • Design the framework and prompt architecture for a conversational AI agent, integrating the WhatsApp API for intelligent responses and automated service flows

items.position: Technical Project Manager | National Maintenance and Support
items.summary:
• Manage communication with clients, ensuring timely technical support
  • Coordinate multidisciplinary teams and provide support to accounting and sales
  • Standardize technical documentation in Jira and Excel, detecting bottlenecks and proposing scalable solutions
  • Prepare reports in English and participate in bilateral meetings to propose improvements in processes and technical communication

items.position: Scrum Project Manager | CRM and Marketing Development
items.summary:
• Coordinate development projects under Scrum, improving team communication and productivity
  • Develop and maintain websites with HTML, Wix, Squarespace and WordPress, ensuring adaptable design
  • Create AURIO UI/UX prototypes in Figma
  • Design and implement a CRM integrated with sales and marketing
  • Integrate REST services and monitor performance metrics with management tools

• Program Arduino and ESP32 microcontrollers using C/C++ for IoT projects
  • Develop innovative electronic prototypes, including a functional smart mirror

items.name: Optimization of National Support and Investment Recovery at BALDAN
items.summary: Direction of a team of 4 technicians in +4 cities, implementing maintenance and support solutions that boosted key sales and recovered more than $16M in pending portfolio

items.name: Process Optimization with AI and Automation at PROCOM
items.summary: Implementation of automated research and development flows with AI, reducing costs by +20% and improving team productivity

items.name: Inventory Management Automation at PROCOM
items.summary: Development of 2 internal applications with code scanning, eliminating errors in the storage flow and avoiding operational losses

items.name: Coordination of Multidisciplinary Teams at AURIO & DRÁCULA STUDIO
items.summary: Management of communication between business, design and development areas, applying Scrum in Jira to ensure agile and collaborative execution

items.name: Agile Project Management at GRUPO FAISÁN
items.summary: Leadership of a team of 3 people applying Scrum to develop APIs linked with Alexa and Google Home, integrating the cloud storage service to save photos and files
